data.name: Chromosome evil - Map Editor
data.detailed_description:
MAP EDITOR:
This DLC contains a map editor for player use.

Content:
- possibility to create new maps
- edit weapon stats for custom maps
- edit enemy stats for custom maps
- edit waves
- possibility to create custom scenario missions
- new objects/possibility to access inventory,skilldex,recruits during custom scenario missions

*Steamworks support included

SKIRMISH
- 1 custom scenario already made by us
- the ability to play your own maps and share them with your friends

ADDITIONAL
- if you make an interesting scenario or a solid normal map you can notify us and we may add it to the main campaign map poll if it meets the requirements.
- if you have additional questions feel free to ask on the Steam community or on our Discord


This DLC is possible because of your support on the main game, Thank you, players!
